title: Invasion U.S.A: American Business in the U.K

sources.title: 1952 - Invasion, U.S.A. - Push a button, and cities vanish! Cold-War thriller film
sources.description:
A mysterious stranger in a New York bar shows a group of complacent Americans a terrifying vision of a Soviet invasion. As atomic bombs level cities and enemy troops advance, each patron faces their own personal apocalypse.

Titles: Invasion USA / Atomic attack against America (1952)
Colorized version https://youtu.be/o1Btb4pO9-A

Director: Alfred E. Green
Writers: Robert Smith, Franz Schulz
Actors: Gerald Mohr, Peggie Castle, Dan O'Herlihy

Genres: Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller, War
Release date: December 10, 1952
Budget: $127,000 (estimated)
Filming location: Los Angeles, California

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: This documentary takes an insightful look at American businesses and how they fare in the United Kingdom. The stories are presented though the eyes of three ex-patriots from the United States; a bar owner, a private jet salesman and a cooking guru, lead us through it.
